attributes.action: Stop the building of Skyscraper Tower Blocks opposite the Tower of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rescind the decision dated 14th February 2006 of the First Secretary of State to allow Berkeley Homes on appeal to build eight tower blocks immediately opposite the Tower of London and adjacent to Tower Bridge.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop the building of Skyscraper Tower Blocks opposite the Tower of London."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11114.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Faulty-Towers/
